title: Disconnect from League Game
body:
I have been randomly disconnect from league games even though my connection is Fine, And also Sometimes when i start league the chat lags in champion select.(if this is a bug that is significant and i get a skin for it, Warring Kingdom Vi is always nice.){{champion:254}} 

Also it happens more often when I play Aurelion Sol for some weird reason

replies.body: Even with a fine internet, you can still have problems reaching or holding onto specific servers.  Your disconnects as well as delays in chat do suggest a connection problem failing to keep up.  Your best bet would be to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix it up.  Let me know if you have any questions.
